about: I am 22 years old and live in Brussels, Belgium. I am passionate about programming and i regularly code my personal projects. I am self-taught since 7 years.

work_experiences.title: Developer full-stack
work_experiences.description: I worked in a young start-up, which allowed me to learn a lot. I was able to lead a small team and gain a lot of project management experience. We mainly used JavaScript with TypeScript.
